description: My brothers website, he is a lovely and I forgot to buy him a christmas gift so I spent the morning of christmas eve making him this. It is pretty poorly made but he seemed to like it.

name: Start Page
description: My personal 'home page' or the tab that opens up when I open up a new time. I switch between qutebrowser, firefox and brave but this always stays with me. It is very useful especially with vimium so I don't have to type into a searchbar. I am a programmer I am hardwiring to be lazy.

name: Crypto Donations
description: A collection of snip bits for interacting with different blockchain payment systems. Intended to make donations easy.

name: Houdini
description: My procedural generations scripts for Houdini, a 3D simulation software. I use this for creating 3D models and simulations for fun.
